column5: Hey OFC'ers,  I remember seeing a fishing store near the intersection of JANE and LAWRENCE in Toronto... Anyone know where its gone? I believe it was called "Fish On-Line" or something to that affect.  I drove through the area just the other day... and I didn't spot it. Did they move? Owner retire? Or worse... Out of business?!  I'd like to visit the store...  Anyone with information would be much appreciated...  Thanks! RoB (A2F)

The last time I spoke to Kris he said he was going to do everything online. Check out his site and you can ask him yourself. He also said he was going to spend more time fishing before he set everything up.  http://www.fishonlineca.com/  Cheers

The last time I spoke to Kris(the owner) he said he was going to do everything online. Check out his site and you can ask him yourself. He also said he was going to spend more time fishing before he set everything up.  http://www.fishonlineca.com/  Cheers
I believe it closed some time last fall. Soon after, all of the stock from the store was for sale at the Bait shop a little north of there on the west side.  Cheers, Mark
